title: Question 28:
description: How to interact with a Synthetix contract using Metamask Mobile Wallet (Android/IOS)?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The step below will show you how to:

Download & setup a new Metamask Mobile Wallet
Interact with a Smart Contract from a Mobile dApp Browser.
The below steps are using Metamask Mobile App which is in beta (use at your own risk) the process has been tested with Trust wallet, but as 23/01 this was not working.
 Download Metamask Mobile App (Beta) Android/IOS  from this [link](https://metamask.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360031184911-How-to-install-MetaMask-Mobile-Public-Beta-)
